suggested: Why did the giant refuse to eat the tiny airplane? He was afraid it would give him a big tummy ache!
Sometimes it feels like the world is too big for us to handle, but we just have to take things one step at a time.
Why do people always feel the need to make themselves seem big by putting others down? It's not right.
Did you know that the tallest recorded person in history was over 8 feet tall? That's really big!
There's no smell associated with the word 'big', but it can be used to describe the scent of large flowers or trees.
The feeling of wrapping your arms around a big teddy bear or snuggling up under a big blanket.
The word 'big' can evoke feelings of awe and wonder at the vastness of the universe, or a sense of belonging and community in a big city or close-knit group of friends.
